page.title: 10Arinagour Primary School
page.content: There is only one school left on Coll now. The school w now go to is a fairly new building, it was built in 1956. There are only thirteen pupils attending the school. Three adults are connected with the school, Miss B. L. Collier, Head teacher, Morag Kennedy, the cleaning lady and Nancy Brackenbury, the school cook. The school times are 9:00am.-10:30am. 11:00am.-12:30pm 1:30pm-2:30pm and 2:40pm 3:30pm. Most of the children come to schoolin cars. one car comes from the eastend, the other from the westend. For secondary schooling the children go to Oban High School. They stay in hostels and get home once every four weeks.
